pages.text: $(li)The Nether Quartz is a hard crystaline mineral that can be found and mined over the Nether.$(br)$(li)Masons will exchange your Nether Quartz by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft multiple items in a Crafting Table.

$(li)Laboratory Blocks$(li)Quartz Glass$(li)Blackboard$(li)Observer$(li)Block of Quartz$(li)Decorative Quartz Amphora$(li)Small Decorative Quartz Pot$(li)Redstone Comparators$(li)Diorite$(li)Granite$(li)Daylight Detectors$(li)Quartz Armor
